<template>
  <form @submit.prevent>
    <label for="">Type</label>
    <select v-model="$props.formInput.typeOfIncome">
      <option>Income</option>
      <option>Outcome</option>
    </select>
    <label for="">Comments</label>
    <input
      type="text"
      placeholder="My salary"
      v-model="$props.formInput.comment"
    />

    <label for="">Value</label>
    <input type="number" placeholder="0" v-model="$props.formInput.value" />

    <button class="btn-submit" type="submit" @addNewType="NewType">Submit</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "FormInput",
  props: {
    formInput: {
      typeOfIncome: String,
      comment: String,
      value: Number,
    },
  },
  data: () => ({}),
  methods:{
    NewType(){
      
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
